aboutMe.description:
I am a 4th Year Computer Science CO-OP student at the University of Ottawa. I will graduate April 2027. 
I have 20+ months of work experience across fullstack development and DevOps. I am most proficient in Typescript and Python.
I am deeply curious about creating unique technical solutions to problems using software. I strive to gain both depth and breadth across areas in the software development lifecycle.

experience1.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
experienceBullets: Updated ES5 legacy code with modern React features to improve performance and maintainability in Nokia's complex web project.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop scalable solutions to serve internal customers.
Contributed 50+ unit and integration tests in Cypress and Jest to ensure code quality and reliability.

experience2.title: Fullstack Developer Intern
experienceBullets: Reduced front-end load times by 10% (p90) by implementing optimized UI rendering and API integration logic.
Build and maintain user interfaces using Typescript, React Redux following test-driven development.
Improved in-house component library through modular design and state management using React and Redux best practices.
Synchronize database and REST API schema to facilitate effective data flow across tech stack.

experience3.title: DevOps Engineering Intern
experienceBullets: Improved CI/CD pipelines (Github Actions, Jenkins) utilizing Github REST API and Github Webhooks API triggers to automate workflows and reduce errors.
Wrote Github actions to modularize testing and deployment processes in YAML.
Updated CMake infrastructure build tools and tested pipelines in a Linux-based development environment.

experience4.title: Front End Developer Intern
experienceBullets: Translating UX mock-ups into functional React components.
Adopted legacy Java features into Web application through creation of server-side API and new UI using Typescript, React.
Implementing unit and integration tests (NUnit, Jest).
Extending and improving React component functionality to alleviate technical debt and fulfill customer requests.
Extending functionality of existing RESTful API endpoints

experience5.title: Front End Developer Intern
experienceBullets: Implemented unit tests to evaluate the efficiency of front-end components in Jest.
Investigated and resolved client-side bugs and performance issues to heighten user experience.
Amplified the usability and maintainability of highly-used React components to streamline development
Collaborated on code reviews and live fire sessions to accelerate developer progress on tasks.
